name: CPCAM CCTV Recording
summary: Learn about .VSR files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: CPCAM is the North American division of Taiwanese closed-circuit television (CCTV) manufacturer AVTECH. Headquartered in Canada, CPCAM offers a variety of CCTV cameras and systems, some of which saved footage in VSR files. Notably, CPD57X and CPD50X series CCTV systems saved footage as VSR files. Modern CPCAM systems do not save footage as VSR files.

instructions: You can play VSR files only in CPCAM's proprietary VSR video players, such as Video Server S (Windows) and VideoViewer for CPCAM (Windows).

windows.name: Open and view .VSR files with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
